payload.title: Parallelism modes are topology optimization, not a toggle
payload.formal: data/tensor/pipeline/expert parallelism trade latency, bandwidth, memory, synchronization.
payload.apm2_mapping: “where an agent runs” is similarly a topology problem: running a holon near its data (repo, ledger shard, evidence store) matters more than raw compute. This is roofline applied to *networked cognition.* Model the placement problem as constrained optimization (75) under failure domains (62).
